name: Virus Bash
description:
Description

You play as a leukocyte and your job is to kill as many intruders (viruses/bacteria) as possible. Kill intruders to earn XP and pick random upgrades. There are 13 different upgrade types. Unfortunately the game is not really balanced. In the pause menu you can see your current stats. Score calculation: (seconds survived * level)

Controls ActionKeyMove WASD Shoot Hold Left Mouse Dash Space Pause ESC or P Toggle Mute M Toggle Fullscreen F Restart R
